title: Mobile Developer (Android/IOS)
description:
- You will work as Android/IOS developer to build a picture sharing platform (like instagram, 500px...) and/or participate in other project upon request by your managers
- Understand the design documents and implement them properly.
- Write unit test
requirements:
- Bachelor degree or up majoring in software engineer, computer sience.
- 2-4 years experiences in same position
- Extensive knowledge about OOP and design patterns.
- Familiar with Android/ IOS programming 
- Preferably server side programming skill with one of the following language and/or related framework: PHP, Java, Python, NodeJS
